title.en: An Aspiration for the Welfare of the Great Hidden Land of Sikkim

text.en: Namo guru!
text.en-trans: namo guru

text.en: Embodiment of the Three Jewels, Three Roots and Three Kāyas,
text.en-trans: chok sum tsa sum ku sum kündüpa

text.en: Protector and guardian of all beings without exception—Guru Padmākara,
text.en-trans: malü drowé kyab gön pema jung

text.en: Together with Vimalamitra, Vairotsana, Tri Songdetsen, Tsogyal and the rest,
text.en-trans: bi ma bai ro trisong tsogyal sok

text.en: All the lineages of vidyādharas forkamaandterma,
text.en-trans: kater rigdzin gyüpa tamché dang

text.en: Peaceful and wrathful yidam deities, ḍākinīs and dharma-protectors,
text.en-trans: yidam zhitro khandro chökyong dang

text.en: Wealth deities, treasure-keepers and the rest—
text.en-trans: norlha ter gyi dakpo la sokpa

text.en: All supreme sources of refuge who have mastered the treasury
text.en-trans: khyen tsé nü pé ter la wang jorwé

text.en: Of wisdom, love and spiritual power, turn your attention towards us!
text.en-trans: kyab kyi chokgyur tamché gong su sol

text.en: May the whole world in general and this hidden land in particular,
text.en-trans: dzamling chi dang khyepar bepé yul

text.en: The Fruit-Filled Valley—Sikkim—like the glorious mountain Lotus Light
text.en-trans: dremo jong zhé palri pema ö

text.en: Transported to earth as a blessed place of accomplishment,
text.en-trans: sa dir pöpé drubné jinchen la

text.en: Be cleansed of all impurity, stains of transgression and defilement.
text.en-trans: mi tsang nyamdrib göpa sang gyur chik

text.en: May the deities of the Three Roots remain forever,
text.en-trans: tsa sum lha nam né dir tak zhuk né

text.en: Bringing down great rains of auspiciousness and vajra-blessings upon the environment and beings,
text.en-trans: nöchü tashi dorjé jin chen wab

text.en: Spreading the riches of the ten virtues and four aspects of well-being1throughout the land,
text.en-trans: yul la gé chu dé zhi palyön gyé

text.en: And summoning the essence of wealth and prosperity from throughout existence and quiescence.
text.en-trans: sizhi cha yang dangchü gukpar dzö

text.en: May the dominion of the dharma-endowed king grow in strength,
text.en-trans: chöden gyalpö chabsi ngatang gyé

text.en: His progeny flourish and his life be secure and long.
text.en-trans: rikgyü pel zhing kutsé yündu ten

text.en: May hostile opposing forces, harm-doers and obstacle-makers
text.en-trans: parol dang dra nöjé dön gek nam

text.en: Be utterly vanquished—destroyed and turned to dust.
text.en-trans: talwé dul zhin lakpar dzé du sol

text.en: May the definitive teachings of the Secret Essence spread far and wide.
text.en-trans: ngé sang nyingpö tenpa rabgyé shing

text.en: May the minds of living beings be filled with love.
text.en-trans: kyendro tamché jampé sem dangden

text.en: May they regard one another as dear parents from former lives,
text.en-trans: pentsün pama tabü dushé kyi

text.en: And genuinely devote themselves to virtuous action.
text.en-trans: yangdak gé la chöpar dzé du sol

text.en: May the prayers of the glorious heruka Namkha Jigme
text.en-trans: heruka pal namkha jikme sok

text.en: And the rest—those known as the four yogi-confrères2
text.en-trans: naljor ché zhi jitar mönpa zhin

text.en: Be fulfilled without obstacle, and may the aspirations and prophecies
text.en-trans: gekmé drub ching guru pema yi

text.en: Of Guru Padma be shown to be infallible.
text.en-trans: tukkyé dentsik luwa mepar shok

text.en: May the activity of asuras and beguilinggongpospirits cease,
text.en-trans: lha mayin dang yi sub gongpo yi

text.en: And may all be auspicious, so that this precious hidden land,
text.en-trans: gyu lam ché né bé yul rinchen gyi

text.en: A treasure-house of fortune and vajra dome beyond peril,
text.en-trans: tashi dzö khang jikme dorjé gur

text.en: Remains forever, as a beacon of virtue and positivity!
text.en-trans: takten gelek nangwé tashi shok
